entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early this morning then changing to a few rain showers near noon and ending this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 early this afternoon. High 6. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
